#summary The :target CSS pseudo-class matches the element that is the target of the URI fragment identifier.
#labels about-css

== Usage ==
{{{
a:target {
   color: red;
}
/* This code segment will make the element that is the target of the URI fragment identifier turn red in color. */
}}}
== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* || *Opera9.5* ||
